SEARCH
Package application

Interface AdminActions

All Known Implementing Classes:
Staff, StudentCommittee
interface AdminActions
This contains methods that "Admins" would need to use.
"Admin" classes that implement these methods are Staff and StudentCommittee. *

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • adminMenu

      default void adminMenu(List<Camp> campList, User activeUser, List<Suggestion> suggestionList, List<Enquiry> enquiryList)
      This method displays and resolves the options for the Admin menu.
      In the main CAMs menu, a check must be done to ensure Student accounts don't call for this method.
      This menu behaves differently based on whether the ActiveUser is a Staff or a StudentCommittee.
      Parameters:
      campList - List of all Camps. Used in parsing camps that are available for the user to perform admin actions on.
      activeUser - User object of the active user.
      suggestionList - List of all Suggestions. Used to save the state of Suggestions.
      enquiryList - List of all Enquiries. Used to save the state of Enquiries.

    • reportMenu

      static void reportMenu(Camp camp, User requestingUser)
      Menu to select report to generate. Staff can generate 1 additional report, Camp Committee Performance Report. The files are saved as yyyyMMdd{ReportName}.
      Parameters:
      camp - Camp object to generate report for.
      requestingUser - User object generating the report. Used to determine if option 3 should be accessed.

    • printAttendeeReport

      static void printAttendeeReport(Camp camp)
      Parses and saves a .txt report for Attendee Report. This report prints the following: CampName, Total Strength out of Max Slots
      In-Charge Staff Name
      Camp Committee count out of Max Committee.
      All Camp Committee member names.
      Attendee count out of Max Attendee slots.
      All Attendee names.
      Blacklisted Student count
      All blacklisted student names.
      Parameters:
      camp - Camp object to generate the report from.

    • printEnquiryReport

      static void printEnquiryReport(Camp camp)
      Parses and saves a .txt report for Enquiry Report. This report prints the following: CampName, Total Enquiries
      In-Charge Staff Name
      Every Enquiry still existing related to the Camp
      Author of the Enquiry
      Reply to the enquiry, or "There was no reply" if no reply
      Author of the Reply
      Parameters:
      camp - Camp object to generate the report from.

    • printCommitteeReport

      static void printCommitteeReport(Camp camp)
      Parses and saves a .txt report for Attendee Report. This report prints the following: CampName, Camp Committee count out of Max Committee.
      In-Charge Staff Name
      One by one, each Camp Committee member
      Every Enquiry replied to by that member
      Every suggestion still existing by that member
      Parameters:
      camp - Camp object to generate the report from.
